description: The Global Lakes and Wetlands Database contains a The combination of best available sources for lakes and wetlands on a global scale which focuses in three coordinated levels on (1) large lakes and reservoirs, (2) smaller water bodies, and (3) wetlands.
title: Global Lakes and Wetlands Database: Lakes and Wetlands Grid (Level 3)
citation: Lehner, B. and Döll, P. 2004. "Development and validation of a global database of lakes, reservoirs and wetlands." Journal of Hydrology 296/1-4: 1-22. Accessed through Resource Watch, (26 April 2022). www.resourcewatch.org.
